headline: Is Boston Properties (BXP) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether BXP at around US$64.77 is a bargain or a value trap, you are in the right place to size up what the market price is actually giving you. The stock has seen mixed performance, with a 4.7% decline over the last 7 days, a 6.6% decline over 30 days, a 4.5% decline year to date and an 8.9% decline over 1 year, while the 3 year return sits at 6.7% and the 5 year return at a 7.5% decline. Recent moves in office and real estate investment trust names, shifts in interest...
